techmeme.title: London-based 9fin, a data provider for debt markets, raised a $50M Series B led by Highland Europe, sources say at a ~$500M valuation on current ARR of ~$25M (Financial Times)
Sources say a number of tech executives, including Sam Altman, worry that Elon Musk's new proximity to Trump could supersize rivalries in ways that favor Musk (Wall Street Journal)
AWS announces AWS Security Incident Response to help customers prepare for, respond to, and recover from various cyber incidents, including ransomware attacks (Kyle Wiggers/TechCrunch)
AWS adds new generative AI features to Amazon Connect, which helps companies run their contact centers, including letting Lex-powered assistants use Amazon Q (Maria Deutscher/SiliconANGLE)
Sources: BYD's contract-manufacturing arm, which has 10K+ engineers and ~100K employees dedicated to the Apple's supply chain, now assembles 30%+ of all iPads (Yang Jie/Wall Street Journal)
